name: Gunman 3D!
description:
To be a sharpshooter, you need to have a powerful gun.
A gun will be given every few seconds, and you can purchase it from the shop. Compound the guns of the same level to get a more powerful one! The more advanced the gun is, the more damages and revenue it will cause. Use the weapon wisely and aim at your enemy, shoot them with the golden bullets so that you can earn three stars as well as the coins and diamonds!

The battle is set, prepare your weapon and kill them all!
publishers: Nanjing Modoo Interactive Entertainment information technology Co
